title: Reduce landing header height by 20% across all screen sizes

requirements.text: Reduce the LandingHeader visual height by 20% across all screen sizes on the current deployed version by decreasing the header’s minimum height and scaling the logo height accordingly, while keeping layout and navigation functionality intact.

quotes: reduce a 20% the full area of the header  please
1. yes, header height reduced by 20%, 2. all screen sizes and 3. yes

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/components/LandingHeader.tsx, the header’s primary container min-height values are reduced by ~20% for both base and md breakpoints (currently min-h-[220px] and md:min-h-[260px]).
The logo image height values are reduced by ~20% for both base and md breakpoints (currently h-[200px] and md:h-[240px]) so the logo remains visually balanced within the smaller header.
On mobile and desktop, the header remains fixed, navigation buttons remain visible and clickable, and the mobile menu open/close behavior still works.
Clicking navigation items still scrolls to the correct section with appropriate offset (no section titles hidden behind the header).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the change limited to header sizing (do not redesign unrelated sections).
nonGoals: Changing header colors, opacity, shadows, or typography.
Changing navigation labels/routes or adding/removing menu items.
